query: SELECT 'clientes' as tabela, COUNT(*) as total FROM clientes UNION ALL SELECT 'notas', COUNT(*) FROM notas UNION ALL SELECT 'certificados', COUNT(*) FROM certificados UNION ALL SELECT 'download_logs', COUNT(*) FROM download_logs UNION ALL SELECT 'agendamentos', COUNT(*) FROM agendamentos;
